A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Start by saying I really liked The Force Awakens\, but The Last Jedi is so much better.  Strong\, emotional performances all around. Incredible action scenes. One of the things that I really liked about it\, that others may not\, is that it is the first Star Wars film to pick up right after the end of the previous film.  Will go be seeing it again\, and again\, and again . . .
